applyBorrowInterest(uint256,address,uint.details: how much interest has accrued to a borrowed balance over time

buyBond(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: buy fixed term bond that does not renew

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payOff(address,uint256).details: gets called by router if loan is extinguished

registerBorrow(address,uint256).details: gets called by router to register if a trader borrows tokens

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

viewBorrowInterest(uint256,address,uint2.details: view function to get current borrowing interest

withdrawBond(uint256).details: send back funds of bond after maturity

bondIds.details: IDs for all bonds held by an address
